title: How to Use Your Laptop As an Emergency Photography Studio

steps.headline: Take your cardboard (for example), and set it on the keyboard.
steps.description: Be sure that it covers the entire laptop so that you won't have any accidental key presses.

steps.headline: Cover the laptop and cardboard with the soft cloth.
steps.description: Depending on the color and thickness of your cloth, you might want to double it up. This is because if your cloth is a translucent white, you could use a white screen on your laptop to enhance your lighting of your subject. You could also use the screen itself, as a light source.

steps.headline: Shoot a grey card to get an accurate white balance.
Put your subject on the cardboard and take its picture.
steps.description: Move around and get different angles.

steps.headline: Download your images and send them on their way!
